summary: A nice mix of fantasy and reality.
descriptionHtml:
[center]NEW Allure ENB
[youtube]NcmCDm1qH6w[/youtube]
[size=2]Big thanks to mellophonist and GlassDeviant for BETA testing the mod!
Be sure to check out mellophonist new menu replacer [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34692//?]here[/url][/size]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/f3x5e.jpg[/IMG]

[font=6]Mirage ENB is a nice mix of fantasy and reality.
Mirage ENB is designed for ENBSeries [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm]0.119[/url][/font]

[color=#BEBEBC][FONT=Palatino Linotype][size=6]Installation[/FONT][/size][/color]

1.) Add the following lines to SkyrimPrefs.ini located in \"C:\\User\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\"

bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1

2.) Extract all the files in the archive to your Skyrim main install folder. To find your main install folder, right click your Skyrim shortcut and click \"Open File Location.\" This is your Skyrim install folder.

3.) Download the ENBSeries binary [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm]here[/url] and extract d3d9.dll from the wrapper folder to your Skyrim install folder.

4.) Done! Shift + F12 to enable/disable ENB, Scroll_Lock to enable/disable SweetFX.

[color=#BEBEBC][FONT=Palatino Linotype][size=6]Required Mods[/FONT][/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930/?]Revamped Exterior Fog[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12454]Dark Dungeons for ENB[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4910]Dramatic Clouds[/url]

[color=#BEBEBC][FONT=Palatino Linotype][size=6]Highly Recommended Mods[/FONT][/size][/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/60/]EBT[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801/]TPC[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of Silence[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15052/?]Apophysis Dragon Priest Masks[/url]

[color=#BEBEBC][FONT=Palatino Linotype][size=6]Credits[/FONT][/size][/color]

Kyokushinoyama for K ENB and Kyo Varients of MATSO ENB, you rock man!

Boris for ENBSeries, who made all this possible!

CeeJay.dk for SweetFX, thanks for the awesome, easy to use program!

mellophonist and GlassDeviant for BETA testing, thanks guys![/center]
author: XxDCExX
